headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Tutor Perini (TPC): Should You Buy?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Tutor Perini (TPC). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Positioned for Resilience and Growth Amid Market Volatility and U.S. Tax Tailwinds
summary: Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the 10 best defensive stocks to buy in a volatile market. On July 7, Citi analysts said U.S. tax reforms—including full bonus depreciation and expanded interest expense deductions—are set to boost cash flows for North American telecom operators. headline: Ocean Power Technologies Installs AI Capable Merrows™ PowerBuoy® for Naval Postgraduate School

headline: Brendan Rineer, AT&T Associate Vice President of Sales, Joins National Lifeline Association Board of Directors as NaLA Honors Stephen Klein's 13 Years of Board Service
summary: The National Lifeline Association (NaLA) is pleased to announce the election of Brendan Rineer, to its Board of Directors. Brendan brings over 20 years of distinguished leadership experience in sales, customer care, and operations, along with a deep commitment to community engagement, making him uniquely qualified to help drive NaLA's mission forward.

headline: AT&T to Accelerate Fiber Buildout by 1M Locations Annually Starting 2026, Citing “One Big Beautiful Bill Act”
summary: AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is one of the best US stocks to buy and hold in 2025.
